An inspiration generator*

Move over Maya Angelou, Ghandi, and Benjamin Franklin. These quotes are from the man who not only knows words, but has the best words.

Get ready to be inspired.

*This is simple site is indented as satire and does not in any way support nor condone the words and actions of Donald Trump.

Made with a random image from Unsplash using their API, in combination with What does Trump think? - available with an API generating a random Trump quote. Any image/quote combination is purely random and not designed to convey any additional message. This site's author hopes you're now inspired to donate to organizations like Politifact who are working tirelessly to bring accountability to the words of Trump and other notable public figures.
